entries.title_d: You've been given the task from Garett to hunt down the Valarians. He has a feeling the Valarians are onto them and must find out for sure by disabling and inspecting. Looks like you're the person for the job. Dirty work at its best.
entries.title: Tatoo System: Hunting the Valarians for Information
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast1 Hutt Informant:\#pcontrast3 < Good work. Now, bring the information to me and we'll analyze it. I knew they were onto us, somehow. I'm glad we'll get to the bottom of this relatively soon. >
entries.quest_location_d: Fly your ship to the Tatoo System for some Valarian-inspecting fun.
entries.quest_inspect_d: Somewhere around the waypoint you received from Garett, Valarians fly around like a moth to a flame. Disable them by targeting their engines or reactors (by using the []'s), and get close to inspect (by pressing 'i'). If you find what you're looking for, you'll need to /dock with the disabled ship and pull the information. Piece of Pyollian cake.
entries.quest_dock_d: To dock with a disabled ship, use the /dock command.
